016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.builders.With;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.NullNode;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
025
026import java.math.BigDecimal;
027import java.time.Period;
028import java.util.*;
029
030/**
031 * @author rickardoberg
032 */
033
034public record Attributes(ObjectNode json)
035        implements JsonElement {
036
037    public record Builder(ObjectNode builder)
038        implements With<Builder>
039    {
040        public Builder() {
041            this(JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode());
042        }
043
044        public Builder attribute(String name, Object value) {
045            builder.set(name, getValue(value));
046            return this;
047        }
048
049        public Builder attribute(Enum<?> name, Object value) {
050            return attribute(name.name(), value);
051        }
052
053        public Builder attribute(String name, JsonNode value) {
054            builder.set(name, value);
055            return this;
056        }
057
058        public Builder attributes(ObjectNode objectNode) {
059            objectNode.fields().forEachRemaining(entry -> builder.set(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()));
060            return this;
061        }
062
063        private JsonNode getValue(Object value) {
064            if (value == null) {
065                return NullNode.instance;
066            } else {
067                if (value instanceof String v) {
068                    return builder.textNode(v);
069                } else if (value instanceof Boolean v) {
070                    return builder.booleanNode(v);
071                } else if (value instanceof Long v) {
072                    return builder.numberNode(v);
073                } else if (value instanceof Integer v) {
074                    return builder.numberNode(v);
075                } else if (value instanceof BigDecimal v) {
076                    return builder.numberNode(v);
077                } else if (value instanceof Double v) {
078                    return builder.numberNode(v);
079                } else if (Double.TYPE.isInstance(value)) {
080                    return builder.numberNode((Double) value);
081                } else if (value instanceof Float v) {
082                    return builder.numberNode(v);
083                } else if (value instanceof Enum v) {
084                    return builder.textNode(v.name());
085                } else if (value instanceof Map) {
086                    Set<Map.Entry<Object, Object>> set = ((Map<Object, Object>) value).entrySet();
087                    ObjectNode map = builder.objectNode();
088                    for (Map.Entry<Object, Object> entry : set) {
089                        map.set(entry.getKey().toString(), getValue(entry.getValue()));
090                    }
091                    return map;
092                } else if (value instanceof Period) {
093                    return builder.textNode(value.toString());
094                } else if (value.getClass().isArray()) {
095                    ArrayNode arrayBuilder = builder.arrayNode();
096
097                    Object[] array = (Object[]) value;
098                    for (Object instance : array) {
099                        arrayBuilder.add(getValue(instance));
100                    }
101                    return arrayBuilder;
102                } else if (value instanceof Collection) {
103                    ArrayNode arrayBuilder = builder.arrayNode();
104                    Collection collection = (Collection) value;
105                    for (Object instance : collection) {
106                        arrayBuilder.add(getValue(instance));
107                    }
108                    return arrayBuilder;
109                } else {
110                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Not a valid value type:" + value.getClass());
111                }
112            }
113        }
114
115        public Attributes build() {
116            return new Attributes(builder);
117        }
118    }
119
120    public boolean isEmpty()
121    {
122        return object().isEmpty();
123    }
124
125    public Optional<JsonNode> getAttribute(String name) {
126        return Optional.ofNullable(object().get(name));
127    }
128
129    public Map<String, String> toMap() {
130        Map<String, String> map = new LinkedHashMap<>(json().size());
131        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JsonNode>> fields = object().fields();
132        while (fields.hasNext()) {
133            Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> entry = fields.next();
134            JsonNode value = entry.getValue();
135            String mapValue = value.toPrettyString();
136            map.put(entry.getKey(), mapValue);
137        }
138        return map;
139    }
140}
